thread.title: Chinese investors lost $1.2 billion in the country's wild west... - SFGate
thread.title_full: Chinese investors lost $1.2 billion in the country's wild west... - SFGate - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: SFGate
title: Chinese investors lost $1.2 billion in the country's wild west... - SFGate
text:
China's online peer-to-peer lending sector - where savers lend out money directly to businesses and consumers over the web - is by far the biggest in the world, but it's also one of the most unregulated. gave an idea of just how big and dangerous it is by outlining how huge losses have been so far.
 SFGate.
